verses.verse: I <S%G3870>beseech<s%> you <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> by the <S%G3628>mercies<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> that you <S%G3936>present<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4983>bodies<s%> a <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2378>sacrifice,<s%> <S%G40>holy,<s%> <S%G2101>acceptable<s%> to <S%G2316>God,<s%> which is <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3050>reasonable<s%> <S%G2999>service.<s%>

And be not <S%G4964>conformed<s%> to <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G165>world:<s%> but be you <S%G3339>transformed<s%> by the <S%G342>renewing<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3563>mind,<s%> that you may <S%G1381>prove<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> is that <S%G18>good,<s%> and <S%G2101>acceptable,<s%> and <S%G5046>perfect,<s%> <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

For I <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> <S%G1325>given<s%> to me, to <S%G3956>every<s%> man that is <S%G1722>among<s%> you, not to <S%G5252>think<s%> of himself <S%G3844>more<s%> <S%G5252>highly<s%> than he <S%G1163>ought<s%> to <S%G5426>think;<s%> but to <S%G5426>think<s%> <S%G1519>soberly,<s%> <S%G4993><s%> according as <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G3307>dealt<s%> to <S%G1538>every<s%> man the <S%G3358>measure<s%> of <S%G4102>faith.<s%>

For as we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G3196>members<s%> in <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4983>body,<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3196>members<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> not the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G4234>office:<s%>

<S%G3779>So<s%> we, being <S%G4183>many,<s%> are <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> and <S%G2596>every<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G3196>members<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> of <S%G240>another.<s%>

<S%G2192>Having<s%> <S%G1161>then<s%> <S%G5486>gifts<s%> <S%G1313>differing<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G5485>grace<s%> that is <S%G1325>given<s%> to us, <S%G1535>whether<s%> <S%G4394>prophecy,<s%> let us prophesy <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G356>proportion<s%> of <S%G4102>faith;<s%>
<S%G1535>Or<s%> <S%G1248>ministry,<s%> let us wait <S%G1722>on<s%> our <S%G1248>ministering:<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> he that <S%G1321>teaches,<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> <S%G1319>teaching;<s%>

<S%G1535>Or<s%> he that <S%G3870>exhorts,<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> <S%G3874>exhortation:<s%> he that <S%G3330>gives,<s%> let him do it with <S%G572>simplicity;<s%> he that <S%G4291>rules,<s%> with <S%G4710>diligence;<s%> he that <S%G1653>shows<s%> <S%G1653>mercy,<s%> with <S%G2432>cheerfulness.<s%>
Let <S%G26>love<s%> be <S%G505>without<s%> <S%G505>dissimulation.<s%> <S%G655>Abhor<s%> that which is <S%G4190>evil;<s%> <S%G2853>hold<s%> to that which is <S%G18>good.<s%>

Be <S%G5387>kindly<s%> <S%G5387>affectionate<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> to <S%G240>another<s%> with <S%G5360>brotherly<s%> <S%G5360>love;<s%> in <S%G5092>honor<s%> <S%G4285>preferring<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another;<s%>
Not <S%G3636>slothful<s%> in <S%G4710>business;<s%> <S%G2204>fervent<s%> in <S%G4151>spirit;<s%> <S%G1398>serving<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord;<s%>
<S%G5463>Rejoicing<s%> in <S%G1680>hope;<s%> <S%G5278>patient<s%> in <S%G2347>tribulation;<s%> <S%G4342>continuing<s%> <S%G4342>instant<s%> in <S%G4335>prayer;<s%>
<S%G2841>Distributing<s%> to the <S%G5532>necessity<s%> of <S%G40>saints;<s%> <S%G1377>given<s%> to <S%G5381>hospitality.<s%>
<S%G2127>Bless<s%> them which <S%G1377>persecute<s%> you: <S%G2127>bless,<s%> and <S%G2672>curse<s%> not.
<S%G5463>Rejoice<s%> with them that do <S%G5463>rejoice,<s%> and <S%G2799>weep<s%> with them that <S%G2799>weep.<s%>

Be of the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G5426>mind<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G240>another.<s%> <S%G5426>Mind<s%> not <S%G5308>high<s%> things, but <S%G4879>condescend<s%> to men of <S%G5011>low<s%> estate. Be not <S%G5429>wise<s%> in <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G3844>conceits.<s%> <S%G1438><s%>

<S%G591>Recompense<s%> to <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G3367>man<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%> for <S%G2556>evil.<s%> <S%G4306>Provide<s%> things <S%G2570>honest<s%> in the <S%G1799>sight<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men.<s%>
<S%G1487>If<s%> it be <S%G1415>possible,<s%> as <S%G3588>much<s%> as lies in you, <S%G1514>live<s%> <S%G1518>peaceably<s%> with <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men.<s%>

Dearly <S%G27>beloved,<s%> <S%G1556>avenge<s%> not <S%G1438>yourselves,<s%> but rather <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%> to <S%G3709>wrath:<s%> for it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G1557>Vengeance<s%> is <S%G1698>mine;<s%> I will <S%G467>repay,<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2190>enemy<s%> <S%G3983>hunger,<s%> <S%G5595>feed<s%> him; <S%G1437>if<s%> he <S%G1372>thirst,<s%> <S%G4222>give<s%> him <S%G4222>drink:<s%> for in <S%G5124>so<s%> <S%G4160>doing<s%> you shall <S%G4987>heap<s%> <S%G440>coals<s%> of <S%G4442>fire<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> his <S%G2776>head.<s%>
Be not <S%G3528>overcome<s%> of <S%G2556>evil,<s%> but <S%G3528>overcome<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%> with <S%G18>good.<s%>
